summary: The diff implements both requirements: REQ-9 adds a Payment Settings card to the AccountDashboardPage that links to admin Stripe settings, and REQ-10 adds a grantAdminPrivileges backend function with corresponding frontend hooks. However, there are issues with REQ-9's implementation regarding accessibility and navigation target.

missing_requirements.requirement: Card is visible to all authenticated users
missing_requirements.reason: The Payment Settings card in AccountDashboardPage is conditionally rendered only when isAdmin is true, making it visible only to admins rather than all authenticated users as specified

missing_requirements.requirement: Clicking the card navigates to the payment settings page
missing_requirements.reason: The card links to '/admin/stripe-settings' (admin-specific page) rather than a general 'payment settings page' accessible to all users. The requirement implies a user-facing payment settings page, but the implementation only provides admin access

hallucinated_features.description: Account Overview card displaying Principal ID in the AccountDashboardPage
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff adds a new Account Overview section with Principal ID display that was not requested in the BuildRequest
